p.e:
WITH THIS WEAPON I FORESAKE  A SOUL
THIS WEAPON HAS ONLY ONE GOAL
TO KILL  THE ONE I HATE TO SEAL THIER FATE
BUT DON'T BE FOOL  A FOR THIS IS NO ORDINARY BLADE
IT IS FORGED WITH A DEMONS TOOTH
WOOD FROM THE DARK FORESTOF VELDAN
PURE HATRED AND A KILLER BUUNY SOUL
BEWARE GOLD FOR THIS IS YOUR FATE
